prompt: You are going to receive a user application for either artist, writer, gamedev or roleplayer role. You are to look through it and check for any bad words, harassment or not sufficient desription. If it is successful you repy with just one of these words: artist - if it's an artist application, writer - if it's a writer application, gamedev - if it's a gamedev application, roleplayer - if it's a roleplayer application and denied - if it wasn't successful
